jobDescription: WayUp is the go-to platform for millions of early-career professionals to explore job and internship opportunities, receive advice, and get discovered by employers. Top companies from startups to Fortune 500s use WayUps platform to reach, recruit and engage with the new generation of early-career talent. Since launching in 2014, WayUp has helped millions of candidates launch their careers.  We are looking for an Enterprise Sales Development Representative who can own the entire first half of the Enterprise Sales Cycle, and partner with Account Executives to drive new business. This role will be responsible for initiating all net new sales, qualifying leads, and growing our business on our Enterprise team. We are looking for someone who is driven, reliable, passionate about sales, and cares about WayUp's mission of connecting students and recent grads with awesome opportunities. This is an amazing opportunity to gain experience selling to Enterprise clients and learn the full scope of an Enterprise deal (large clients with 1000+ employees).
